ARABIC: وَلَا تَقُولَنَّ لِشَا۟ىْءٍ إِنِّى فَاعِلٌ ذَٰلِكَ غَدًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Never say about anything, 'I will do that tomorrow,' -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do not say of any thing: "I will do it tomorrow,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And never say about anything: "I shall certainly do this tomorrow"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Never say of something, "I shall do it tomorrow,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And never say about anything that, “I will do this tomorrow.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And never say of anything, "I shall do such and such thing tomorrow."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And do not say of anything: Surely I will do it tomorrow,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And do not say, regarding anything, 'I am going to do that tomorrow,'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And say not of anything: Lo! I shall do that tomorrow,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: never say of anything, "I shall certainly do this tomorrow,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And never say thou of a thing: verily I am going to do that on the morrow.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do not say about anything, ‘I will indeed do it tomorrow,’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nor say of anything, "I shall be sure to do so and so tomorrow"-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And never say of anything, "I shall do such and such thing tomorrow."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do not say of anything: 'I will do it tomorrow'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And never say about anything, “I will do that tomorrow.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And never say of anything, "Indeed, I will do that tomorrow,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [18:23] And never say regarding something, that is, for the purpose of [doing] something, ‘I will indeed do that tomorrow’, in other words, [I will do something] at some future [point] in time,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And say not) Muhammad (of anything: Lo! I shall do that tomorrow) or I shall say that tomorrow,
